name: Pyromancer: Flame of Darkness
description:
A game? No that is not enough, this is an EXPERIENCE. A story for the AGES. Will you triumph over the darkness? Or will you be consumed by it?

You take the role of a magic user with the power to trade life-force for fire and fire for life-force on a mission to defeat an ancient power.

Coded in godot, download the folder, unzip and run the exe to play.

Assets taken from @CreativeSky2000 for the free staff models I used and kenney.nl for almost everything else. Also credit to lightbaton.
